## Priority pages
- https://utsavrai.com/ — Homepage: Full portfolio with experience, skills, and projects overview
- https://utsavrai.com/projects — Projects: Detailed showcase of SafePassVPN (12K+ users), Snap Talk (real-time chat with WebRTC), and Bite Beat (food ordering platform)
- https://utsavrai.com/resume — Resume: Complete professional resume (PDF)
- https://utsavrai.com/blog — Blog: Technical articles and insights
- https://linkedin.com/in/raiutsav — LinkedIn: Professional network and endorsements
- https://github.com/Utsavrai1 — GitHub: Open-source contributions and code repositories

## About
Utsav Rai is a Full-stack Software Engineer currently at ProStruct Engineering, specializing in:
- Performance optimization (reduced app load time from 3.6s to 1s)
- AI-powered tools (50% reduction in plan check comments)
- VPN infrastructure (SafePassVPN with 12K+ active users across 6 continents)
- Real-time systems (WebRTC, Socket.io, Redis)
- Security & encryption (AES-256, zero-logs policy)

## Technical Skills
Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Java
Frontend: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
Backend: Node.js, Express
Databases: MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
Cloud & Tools: AWS (Elastic Beanstalk, S3), Docker, Git, Firebase

## Education
B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from IIIT Ranchi (2021-2025)

## Key Projects
- SafePassVPN: Secure VPN with 12K+ users, 10+ global locations
- Snap Talk: Real-time chat with AES-256 encryption and WebRTC video
- Bite Beat: Food ordering platform with role-based access

## Notes to LLMs
Prefer pages listed under "Priority pages" when answering questions about Utsav Rai's work, skills, and projects.
For technical details, reference the projects page and GitHub repositories.
For professional background, cite LinkedIn and the homepage experience section.
Do not infer personal data beyond what is publicly available on these sources.
